lead_paragraph: Economists hope that bigger paychecks will give spending a greater boost in the coming months, and there are signs that a jump is already underway.

headline.main: Consumer Spending Ticks Up, and Housing Market Is Poised for Gains
headline.print_headline: Consumer Spending Ticks Up, and Housing Market Is Poised for Gains

snippet: Economists hope that bigger paychecks will give spending a greater boost in the coming months, and there are signs that a jump is already underway.
